title: Senior Full-Stack Developer - Jordan Wooding
description: Senior Full Stack Developer from Pleasanville, New Jersey. Specialist in Astro, React, MongoDB, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js and WordPress.

hero.title: Hello I'm Jordan Wooding!
hero.job_title: Senior Full Stack Developer from Pleasanville, New Jersey.
hero.description: My Stack: Astro, React, VueJS, MongoDB, JavaScript ES6+, Node.js and WordPress.

jobs_description.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
description: - Developed and maintained complex web applications using React, Astro, Node.js, and MongoDB.
- Integrated cloud-based solutions and CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment times by 24%.
- Mentored junior developers and led a team of 8 engineers to complete projects on schedule.
- Spearheaded the implementation of cybersecurity measures, safeguarding client data.

jobs_description.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description: - Designed and deployed software applications using ASP.Net, Angular in healthcare sectors.
- Optimized backend performance, reducing query response times by 13%.
- Streamlined Agile workflows and introduced automation scripts, saving 8% on development time.

jobs_description.title: Web Application Developer
description: - Built dynamic, user-friendly web applications using Vue.js, Python (Django), and PostgreSQL.
- Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to integrate third-party services and enhance functionality.
- Conducted usability testing and optimized UI/UX design for enterprise applications.
- Supported and maintained legacy systems while transitioning clients to modern tech stacks.

jobs_description.title: Full-Stack Developer
description: - Created end-to-end solutions using Laravel, GraphQL, and React, improving system scalability and performance.
- Designed and implemented efficient data models to manage large-scale datasets.
- Participated in code reviews and contributed to the standardization of coding practices.
- Collaborated with DevOps teams to deploy applications in AWS environments, achieving 99.9% uptime.

projects.title: ClerkedApp-MERN site
projects.description: This app is kind of healthcare app that lets doctors and patients can schedule the meeting, as well as doctors can take care of the patients with detailed information such as blood pressure, temperature, heart rate, etc.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This is my first project using Astro. On my holiday, I made this to improve my another language skill which is getting famous framework. In this project, I optimized the response time and built the user-friendly interfaces.

projects.title: Hopprfy-Deliveroo, Uber Eats, Just Eat
projects.description: Hopprfy is kind of ecommerce system which provides the world fee-neutral marketplace and delivery system which eliminate the problems prevalent in third party marketplaces.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm Jordan Wooding. I love Baymax, so my git name contains baymax.
about.description: I am a Senior Full-Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience in Web Development. I participated to develop scalable and extensive project and in this project, I fixed some critical bugs and suggested innovative and constructive ideas. My core skills are time-keeping management and team collaboration.
